mapper.select: SELECT BOOKING_TIME FROM BOOKING_TBL WHERE P_NO=#{PNo} AND START_DATE=#{startDate}

select booking_no as bookingNo from booking_tbl where (to_char(end_date,'yy/mm/dd(hh:mi)')<to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd(hh:mi)') and not partner_accept = 'D') or (to_char(start_date,'yy/mm/dd(hh:mi)')<to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd(hh:mi)') and not partner_accept = 'D' and end_date is null)

select booking_no as bookingNo, member_id as memberId, p_no as pNo, pet_no as petNo, booked_date as bookedDate, to_char(start_date,'yy/mm/dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date,'yy/mm/dd') as endDate, booking_time as bookingTime, special_request as specialRequest, review_state as reviewState, partner_accept as partnerAccept, category, price from booking_tbl where member_id=#{memberId} order by start_date desc

select booking_no as bookingNo, member_id as memberId, p_no as pNo, pet_no as petNo, to_char(booked_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as bookedDate, booking_phone as bookingPhone, to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, booking_time as bookingTime, special_request as specialRequest, partner_accept as partnerAccept, category from booking_tbl where p_no=#{pNo} and partner_accept='R' order by start_date

select booking_no as bookingNo, member_id as memberId, pet_no as petNo, booking_phone as bookingPhone, to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, end_date as endDate, booking_time as bookingTime, special_request as specialRequest, category, price from booking_tbl where partner_accept ='Y' order by start_date

select booking_no as bookingNo, member_id as memberId, pet_no as petNo, booking_phone as bookingPhone, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, booking_time as bookingTime, special_request as specialRequest, category, price from booking_tbl where partner_accept ='Y' order by start_date
mapper.update: update booking_tbl set review_state='1' where booking_no=#{bookingNo}
